channel.title: CVE Feed for Samsung Mobile -- Gallery
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Samsung Mobile -- Gallery

item.title: CVE-2021-25379|2024-08-03T20:03:05.863Z -- samsung%20mobile -- gallery
item.description: Intent redirection vulnerability in Gallery prior to version 5.4.16.1 allows attacker to execute privileged action.

item.title: CVE-2024-20827|2024-07-05T17:21:30.446Z -- samsung%20mobile -- gallery
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in Samsung Gallery prior to version 14.5.04.4 allows physical attackers to access the picture using physical keyboard on the lockscreen.

item.title: CVE-2024-20827|2024-02-06T02:23:17.680Z -- samsung%20mobile -- gallery
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability in Samsung Gallery prior to version 14.5.04.4 allows physical attackers to access the picture using physical keyboard on the lockscreen.
